sentences.en: Many of the older houses now have been rehabilitated.
They can start the rehabilitation immediately.

words.rootVisual: <circle cx='8' cy='12' r='4' stroke='currentColor' fill='none'/><circle cx='16' cy='12' r='4' stroke='currentColor' fill='none'/><path d='M10 12l4 0' stroke='currentColor' stroke-width='2'/><path d='M14 12l-2-2M14 12l-2 2' stroke='currentColor'/>

sentences.en: His sister retaliated by kicking him.
This action was in retaliation for last week's bomb attack.

sentences.en: Continuing violence will retard negotiations over the country's future.
